{{< block "grid-1" >}}

# sandra.sys ![:inline](/images/twitter_verified.png) 


### Description

sandra.sys is a vulnerable driver and more information will be added as found.
- **UUID**: bc5e020a-ecff-43c8-b57b-ee17b5f65b21
- **Created**: 2023-01-09
- **Author**: Michael Haag
- **Acknowledgement**:  | [](https://twitter.com/)

{{< button "https://github.com/khulnasoft-labs-io/mitigate-drivers/raw/main/drivers/9a237fa07ce3ed06ea924a9bed4a6b99.bin" "Download" >}}
{{< tip "warning" >}}
This download link contains the vulnerable driver!

{{< /tip >}}

### Commands

```
sc.exe create sandra.sys binPath=C:\windows\temp\sandra.sys type=kernel &amp;&amp; sc.exe start sandra.sys
```


| Use Case | Privileges | Operating System | 
|:---- | ---- | ---- |
| Elevate privileges | kernel | Windows 10 |

#### ImportedFunctions
{{< details "Expand" >}}
* ZwSetValueKey
* NtQueryInformationProcess
* ZwClose
* MmMapIoSpace
* MmUnmapIoSpace
* IoQueryDeviceDescription
* ZwSetInformationThread
* RtlUnicodeStringToAnsiString
* IoAllocateMdl
* MmBuildMdlForNonPagedPool
* MmMapLockedPagesSpecifyCache
* MmUnmapLockedPages
* IoFreeMdl
* ZwCreateKey
* MmResetDriverPaging
* KeAcquireSpinLockRaiseToDpc
* KeReleaseSpinLock
* IofCompleteRequest
* MmPageEntireDriver
* IoUnregisterShutdownNotification
* IoDeleteSymbolicLink
* IoDeleteDevice
* RtlQueryRegistryValues
* IoCreateDevice
* IoCreateSymbolicLink
* IoRegisterShutdownNotification
* KeBugCheckEx
* RtlAppendUnicodeToString
* IoReportResourceUsage
* RtlInitUnicodeString
* __C_specific_handler
* HalSetBusDataByOffset
* HalGetBusDataByOffset
* HalTranslateBusAddress
* KeStallExecutionProcessor
